```         
library(dslabs)
data(na_example)
# NA data frame
na_example
# Total number of NAs
sum(is.na(na_example))
no_nas_example <- ifelse(is.na(na_example), 0, na_example)
# New data frame with NAs replaced with 0
no_nas_example
# Total number of NAs after NAs replaced with 0
sum(is.na(no_nas_example))
```
